pages.title: Kamen Rider Haruma
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Ride Kamens (2024, mobile game)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ride_kamens/devices/chaos_driver#chaos_driver_haruma)Chaos Driver (Haruma)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch II$(li)Haste$(li)Jump Boost II$(li)Strength V (with empty hand)$(li)Strength II (with weapon)
